Oracles.Name: Theme Type
Oracles.Description: Themes help you envision atmosphere, features, and encounters within an unusual, aberrant, or important location. You can answer questions about a place using only the tables provided for a theme, such as when delving into an **Infested** cave. Or you can pair a theme with other location oracles for more flavor and variety; for example, you might explore a **Haunted Grave World**, a **Ruined Derelict**, a **Sacred Precusor Vault**, or an **Inhabited Settlement**.
Table: Reality is corrupted or warped in this place.
Enemies defend this place against intruders.
Restless spirits are bound to this place.
Foul creatures have overrun this place.
People have built a community in this place.
Time, disaster, or war have ravaged this place.
The faithful worship inscrutable powers in this place.
